modName: From Arena to Skyrim - Main menu theme replacer
summary: Replaces the main theme with musics from Arena to Skyrim in one medley.
descriptionHtml:
This mod will replace the Skyrim\'s main theme with the musics from this video:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=adlIBRAy6uM&feature=channel_video_title

Credit:

* Taioo for having created this piano version. ----- [url=http://www.youtube.com/user/Taioo?feature=watch] Youtube Channel [/url]
* Bethesda Softworks for the original content (not included).

WARNING: this mod has been approved by the author. No copyrighted files are uploaded here: they have been played by the author of the video. The music uploaded here is a self-rendition and is not a part of any game as it is.
If the Nexus admins have any issue with this, please do tell me if I am doing something wrong; my goal is obviously to stay in the rules of the website.
author: Sagittarius22

files.name: From Arena to Skyrim - Explore music replacer
